name: Glitch and Descent
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a short but "some sort of scary" horror game? Well, here you have it. Glitch and descent is about your grandparents, and you sometimes  glitch into their reality. However, they are not so friendly...

note: it is pretty badly made in my opinion, and has a short amount of gameplay. I probably won't fix some of the bugs such as the camera sometimes clipping into the ground, etc. (just ignore that for best gameplay!)
